title: Michael D'Antonio: "The Shadow President"
description: Michael's conversation with Michael D'Antonio, co-author (with Peter Eisner) of "The Shadow President: The Truth About Mike Pence." Original air date 28 August 2018. The book was published on 28 August 2018.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael D'Antonio, Michael Smerconish)
